A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Created a rotten tomatoes account just to give TLJ the negative review it deserves. Complete character assassination of Luke Skywalker\, and a flagrant\, irresponsible disregard for the mythology that Lucas created I was left heartbroken. \n\nI wasn't in love with TFA\, but i liked it enough to root for this trilogy to be good.
